scenes.action_text: BEING THE RICARDOS Written by Aaron Sorkin FADE IN: We meet--individually--three people who are the older versions of three characters we'll meet shortly. They're speaking to an off-camera interviewer in three different locations that have been chosen, dressed and lit for a documentary. 1 INT. SOUNDSTAGE BLEACHERS - DAY 1 JESS is sitting in the bleachers of a television soundstage. OLDER
